constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 100 (Monday, June 13, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. FITZPATRICK:
H.R. 8032.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section VIII
[Page H5486]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committees on Natural Resources, Ways and Means, and Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: REEShore Act of 2022
